html: Glad the ME Senate just defeated legislation for a new referendum to repeal the legal adult use cannabis. It’s one thing for the legislature to make changes to the law — checks & balances. It’s another to have the people vote again because we didn’t like the outcome last time.
text:
Glad the ME Senate just defeated legislation for a new referendum to repeal the legal adult use cannabis.

It’s one thing for the legislature to make changes to the law — checks & balances.

It’s another to have the people vote again because we didn’t like the outcome last time.
